title: Any Idea Name Of Script Font
author: Yorkinmomma

comments.content:
It looks like **[CK Legacy](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820215718/http:/www.scrapandpapershop.com/product/ck-font-design-legacy/personal-use-fonts)** from Creating Keepsakes magazine

-----------------------------------------------  
I found it using Find my Font - [http://www.findmyfont.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820215718/http:/www.findmyfont.com/ "http://www.findmyfont.com")
Thank you! I tried my FindMyFont program but I didn't get it identified. I must not have done something right if you found it using it!
